description: Tropical, refreshing and perfect on a warm day or balmy evening, this magical mocktail features refreshing watermelon with muddled lychee and mint.
name: Lychee, Watermelon & Mint Mocktail Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Divide lychee mixture among glasses. Top up each glass with lemonade and garnish with mint. Serve with lime wedges.
